message:
In the guide above (https://www.gdquest.com/tutorial/godot/2d/tactical-rpg-movement/lessons/01.grid/) It references "course downloads, tactical-rpg/start-project/" without a link on the page to where I could find this it was quite difficult to track it down, but I eventually found it with some Github searching. Would be a nice quality of life to add a course download section (unless it's here and I am blind) or maybe a hyperlink.

https://github.com/GDQuest/godot-2d-tactical-rpg-movement
